ground_truth: Evan stares dumbstruck at the machine while Mr. Miller puts the camera on a tripod in the basement. Kayleigh and Evan sit on folding chairs in front of the camera as Tommy stands at the top of the basement stairs, looking down. Mr. Miller lowers his voice and speaks to Evan and Kayleigh, then gets behind the lens. Someone silently opens the door at the top of the basement stairs and watches with horror. Mr. Miller walks behind Kayleigh and cups his hands tightly around her ears, so she can't hear anything now. Evan leans over to whisper in Kayleigh's ear. Kayleigh stares at the floor, then looks up at her father and shivers. Evan whips around to see Kayleigh watching him, causing him to lurch back from the shock and fall to the floor. She sees Evan's nose bleed, and her eyes go wide. Evan, still stunned, can do little but stare from the floor. He stands in the middle of her bedroom, surrounded by sorority plaques and pink preppy decor, hardly able to take his eyes off her as she hands him a tissue. He reaches for his clothes at the foot of the bed and comes up with a Greek-lettered fraternity sweatshirt and brown suede jacket, then frowns with distaste, grabs a towel, and heads out. At the sink, Evan washes the blood off his face and looks at his reflection in the mirror. Evan turns around and sees Gwen, one of the sorority brats from the bar, exit the shower naked; she pats his ass and exits the bathroom. Kayleigh, wearing a long skirt and tight red sweater, catches the eye of every guy on campus as she and Evan stroll arm in arm through the quad. Many students wave to Evan and call his name. Kayleigh gives him a big unexpected kiss and walks away. After a moment of wow, Evan runs off to class himself. Evan inserts his last quarter into the lobby pay phone and dials a telephone number. He hangs up the phone, then checks his watch. At that moment, Thumper passes Evan in the lobby, walks away, leaving Evan dumbfounded. Evan runs into the lecture hall and gets in line behind other students who are taking No. 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter's desk, then he walks up the aisle and takes a seat. As he sits down, someone puts their arm menacingly around Evan's throat. Evan flinches, turns around, and sees Hunter, the frat guy Thumper assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank's bar. Hunter surreptitiously hands Evan a cheat-sheet to the exam. Evan nods and smiles as exams are passed down his row. Finally, Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Evan gazes speechless at the apparatus while Mr. Miller places the camera on a stand in the cellar. Kayleigh and Evan perch on collapsible chairs in front of the camera as Tommy stands at the top of the cellar stairs, peering downward. Mr. Miller lowers his voice and utters to Evan and Kayleigh, then moves behind the lens. Someone quietly opens the door at the top of the cellar stairs and observes with fright. Mr. Miller moves behind Kayleigh and encloses his hands firmly around her ears, so she can't perceive anything now. Evan bends over to murmur in Kayleigh's ear. Kayleigh gazes at the ground, then glances up at her father and trembles. Evan spins around to glimpse Kayleigh observing him, causing him to recoil from the surprise and collapse to the ground. She notices Evan's nose bleed, and her eyes enlarge. Evan, still astonished, can do little but gaze from the ground. He stands in the middle of her bedroom, encircled by sorority plaques and pink preppy decor, scarcely able to avert his eyes from her as she hands him a tissue. He reaches for his garments at the foot of the bed and comes up with a Greek-lettered fraternity sweatshirt and brown suede jacket, then grimaces with displeasure, grabs a towel, and departs. At the basin, Evan cleans the blood from his visage and looks at his likeness in the mirror. Evan rotates and sees Gwen, one of the sorority brats from the bar, leave the shower unclothed; she pats his rear and leaves the bathroom. Many students wave to Evan and shout his name. Kayleigh gives him a big unexpected kiss and walks away. After a moment of amazement, Evan dashes off to class himself. Evan inserts his last quarter into the lobby pay telephone and dials a phone number. He hangs up the phone, then checks his wristwatch. Evan rushes into the lecture hall and gets in line behind other students who are taking No. 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter's desk, then he ascends the aisle and takes a seat. test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Evan stands there, utterly dumbstruck, his eyes fixed on the machine, while Mr. Miller methodically sets up the camera on a sturdy tripod in the dimly lit basement. Kayleigh and Evan settle themselves onto folding chairs positioned directly in front of the camera, as Tommy stands at the top of the basement stairs, peering down with curiosity. Mr. Miller lowers his voice to speak quietly to Evan and Kayleigh, then moves behind the camera lens, preparing to capture the moment. Suddenly, someone silently opens the door at the top of the basement stairs, watching the scene unfold with a sense of horror. Mr. Miller walks behind Kayleigh and firmly cups his hands around her ears, ensuring she can't hear anything now. Evan leans over to whisper something in Kayleigh's ear. Kayleigh, initially staring at the floor, looks up at her father and shivers slightly. Evan, noticing her gaze, whips around to see Kayleigh watching him intently, causing him to lurch back in shock and fall to the floor. She observes Evan's nose begin to bleed, her eyes widening in surprise. Evan, still stunned, can do little but stare up from the floor. 

Later, he finds himself standing in the middle of her bedroom, surrounded by sorority plaques and pink preppy decor, hardly able to take his eyes off her as she hands him a tissue. He reaches for his clothes at the foot of the bed and comes up with a Greek-lettered fraternity sweatshirt and a brown suede jacket. He frowns with distaste, grabs a towel, and heads out. At the sink, Evan carefully washes the blood off his face and looks at his reflection in the mirror. As he turns around, he sees Gwen, one of the sorority brats from the bar, exit the shower completely naked; she casually pats his ass and exits the bathroom. Kayleigh, dressed in a long skirt and a tight red sweater, catches the eye of every guy on campus as she and Evan stroll arm in arm through the bustling quad. Many students wave to Evan and call out his name. Kayleigh surprises him with a big, unexpected kiss and then walks away. After a moment of being wowed, Evan runs off to his class. 

Evan inserts his last quarter into the lobby pay phone and dials a telephone number. He hangs up the phone, then checks his watch. At that moment, Thumper passes Evan in the lobby, walking away and leaving Evan dumbfounded. Evan rushes into the lecture hall and gets in line behind other students who are taking No. 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter's desk. He then walks up the aisle and takes a seat. As he sits down, someone puts their arm menacingly around Evan's throat. Evan flinches, turns around, and sees Hunter, the frat guy Thumper assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank's bar. Hunter surreptitiously hands Evan a cheat-sheet for the exam. Evan nods and smiles as the exams are passed down his row. Finally, Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
Evan stands there, completely dumbstruck and unable to process what he's witnessing, his eyes glued to the strange machine. Meanwhile, Mr. Miller is methodically and carefully setting up the camera, ensuring it is perfectly positioned on a sturdy tripod in the dimly lit, somewhat eerie basement. Kayleigh and Evan settle themselves onto uncomfortable folding chairs, which have been strategically positioned directly in front of the camera's lens. Tommy, standing at the top of the basement stairs, leans in ever so slightly, peering down with unmistakable curiosity about what is unfolding below. Mr. Miller lowers his voice to speak softly and directly to Evan and Kayleigh before moving silently behind the camera lens, preparing to capture the critical moment. Suddenly and without warning, the door at the top of the basement stairs opens silently, revealing someone who watches the entire scene unfold with a growing sense of horror. Mr. Miller walks quietly and swiftly behind Kayleigh, firmly placing his hands over her ears to ensure she can't hear anything that might happen next. Evan, seizing the opportunity, leans over to whisper something in Kayleigh's ear. Initially, Kayleigh is staring at the floor, but she looks up at her father and shivers slightly, perhaps from a chill in the air or something deeper. Evan, noticing her penetrating gaze, quickly whips around, only to lock eyes with Kayleigh, who is watching him intently. This intense moment causes him to lurch back in shock, losing balance and falling to the floor. Kayleigh observes Evan as his nose begins to bleed, her eyes widening in surprise at the unexpected sight. Evan, still in a state of shock and disbelief, can do little but stare upward from his position on the floor. 

Later on, Evan finds himself standing, almost disoriented, in the middle of her brightly decorated bedroom, surrounded by an array of sorority plaques and pink, preppy decor that feels almost overwhelming. He can hardly take his eyes off Kayleigh as she gracefully hands him a tissue. Reaching for his clothes at the foot of the bed, he comes up with a Greek-lettered fraternity sweatshirt and a somewhat out-of-place brown suede jacket. He frowns with distaste, clearly unimpressed, before grabbing a towel and making his way out. At the sink, Evan meticulously washes the blood off his face and takes a good, hard look at his reflection in the mirror. As he turns around, he unexpectedly sees Gwen—one of the sorority brats they encountered at the bar—exiting the shower completely naked; she casually pats his ass and then exits the bathroom without a second thought. Meanwhile, Kayleigh, dressed attractively in a long skirt paired with a tight red sweater, catches the eye of every guy on campus as she and Evan stroll together, arm in arm, through the bustling, lively quad. Many students wave to Evan and call out his name with familiarity. Kayleigh takes him by surprise with a big, unexpected kiss and then walks away, leaving Evan momentarily wowed. After taking a moment to gather his thoughts, Evan dashes off to his class. 

Evan reaches for his last quarter and inserts it into the lobby pay phone, dialing a telephone number with purpose. After the brief call, he hangs up the phone and checks the time on his watch. At that very moment, Thumper passes Evan in the lobby, walking away and leaving Evan standing there, utterly dumbfounded by the encounter. Determined, Evan rushes into the lecture hall, getting in line behind other students who are taking No. 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter's desk, readying themselves for the exam. He then walks up the aisle and takes a seat, preparing for what comes next. As he sits down, he suddenly feels an arm being placed menacingly around his throat. Evan flinches, instantly alert, and turns around to see Hunter, the frat guy whom Thumper had assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank's bar. Hunter, moving stealthily, hands Evan a cheat-sheet for the exam. Evan nods in acknowledgment and smiles as the exams are passed down his row, ready to begin. Finally, Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having a moment of intimacy.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Evan stands frozen in disbelief, his eyes fixed on the machine, while Mr. Miller methodically sets up the camera on a tripod in the dimly lit basement. Kayleigh and Evan settle into their folding chairs positioned in front of the camera, their expressions a mix of anticipation and unease, as Tommy lingers at the top of the basement stairs, peering down with a curious gaze. Mr. Miller lowers his voice to a hushed tone, addressing Evan and Kayleigh with a seriousness that fills the room, before he moves behind the camera lens, ready to capture the moment. Unbeknownst to them, the door at the top of the basement stairs creaks open, and a silent observer peers in, their face contorted in horror at the unfolding scene. Mr. Miller steps behind Kayleigh, gently but firmly cupping his hands around her ears, ensuring she is enveloped in silence, unable to hear the words exchanged. Evan leans in close to Kayleigh, whispering softly into her ear, his breath warm against her skin. Kayleigh's gaze drops to the floor, her mind racing, before she lifts her eyes to meet her father's, a shiver running through her as she processes the gravity of the situation. In a sudden, startling motion, Evan spins around, his eyes locking with Kayleigh's, the intensity of her stare causing him to recoil in shock, losing his balance and crashing to the floor. As he lies there, dazed, Kayleigh's eyes widen in alarm at the sight of blood trickling from Evan's nose. Evan, still reeling from the fall, can only manage to stare up at her from his position on the floor. The scene shifts, and Evan finds himself standing in the middle of Kayleigh's bedroom, surrounded by the trappings of her sorority life—plaques adorning the walls and pink preppy decor filling the space. His attention is drawn to Kayleigh as she hands him a tissue, her presence commanding his focus. He reaches down to gather his clothes from the foot of the bed, his fingers closing around a Greek-lettered fraternity sweatshirt and a brown suede jacket. A frown of distaste crosses his face as he discards them in favor of a towel, which he clutches as he exits the room. At the bathroom sink, Evan methodically washes the blood from his face, his eyes meeting his own reflection in the mirror, a moment of introspection passing over him. As he turns away from the mirror, Gwen, one of the sorority girls he recognizes from the bar, emerges from the shower, unabashedly naked. She playfully pats his backside before sauntering out of the bathroom, leaving Evan momentarily taken aback. Later, Kayleigh, dressed in a long skirt and a tight red sweater that accentuates her figure, captures the attention of every guy on campus as she and Evan walk arm in arm through the bustling quad. Students greet Evan with waves and calls of his name, acknowledging his presence with friendly enthusiasm. In a spontaneous gesture, Kayleigh plants a big, unexpected kiss on Evan's lips before turning to walk away, leaving him momentarily stunned by the affectionate display. As the realization of the moment sinks in, Evan snaps out of his daze and dashes off to his class, eager to keep up with his schedule. In the lobby, Evan inserts his last quarter into the pay phone, carefully dialing a number before hanging up and checking his watch, a sense of urgency in his actions. Just then, Thumper passes by, his presence a fleeting distraction that leaves Evan momentarily dumbfounded. Gathering his wits, Evan hurries into the lecture hall, joining the line of students who are each taking a No. 2 pencil from a box on Professor Carter's desk. With pencil in hand, he makes his way up the aisle and finds a seat, settling in for the exam. As he sits, a menacing arm wraps around his throat, causing him to flinch and turn around in alarm. He finds himself face to face with Hunter, the frat guy who had been on the receiving end of Thumper's aggression at Dirty Hank's bar. In a covert exchange, Hunter slips Evan a cheat-sheet for the exam, a gesture that Evan acknowledges with a nod and a smile as the exams are distributed down the row. The scene shifts once more, and Evan and Kayleigh lie together, having just finished an intimate moment, the culmination of a series of events that have left them both changed.

Later, in her bedroom, surrounded by sorority decor, Evan receives a tissue from Kayleigh, then retrieves his clothes, including a fraternity sweatshirt and suede jacket, and leaves with a towel. At the sink, he washes the blood from his face and sees Gwen, a sorority girl, exit the shower and pat him as she leaves. Kayleigh, in a long skirt and red sweater, draws attention as she and Evan walk arm in arm through the campus quad, where many students greet Evan. Kayleigh surprises him with a kiss before departing, leaving Evan momentarily awed before he heads to class. Evan uses his last quarter on a pay phone, checks his watch, and is left dumbfounded as Thumper passes by. In the lecture hall, Evan lines up for a pencil, takes a seat, and is startled when Hunter, a frat guy, menacingly puts an arm around him and discreetly hands him a cheat-sheet. Evan acknowledges this as exams are distributed. Finally, Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex.

test_cases.description:
Evan stares dumbstruck at the machine, an intricate contraption recently acquired for its rumored capabilities to manipulate memories, while Mr. Miller, a local photographer known for his attention to detail, puts the camera on a tripod in the basement that once served as a storage area during Prohibition. Kayleigh and Evan sit on folding chairs in front of the camera as Tommy, the neighborhood troublemaker, stands at the top of the basement stairs, looking down with a mix of curiosity and suspicion. Mr. Miller lowers his voice and speaks to Evan and Kayleigh, then gets behind the lens to capture this moment steeped in mystery. Someone silently opens the door at the top of the basement stairs, a silhouette watching with horror due to the machine's unsettling reputation. Mr. Miller walks behind Kayleigh and cups his hands tightly around her ears, so she can't hear anything now, perhaps to shield her from the machine's rumored effects. Evan leans over to whisper in Kayleigh's ear, sharing what could be crucial information. Kayleigh stares at the floor, then looks up at her father and shivers, overwhelmed by the tension in the room. Evan whips around to see Kayleigh watching him, causing him to lurch back from the shock and fall to the floor due to the sudden motion. She sees Evan's nose bleed, a common side effect of the machine's interaction with its users, and her eyes go wide. Evan, still stunned, can do little but stare from the floor.

He stands in the middle of her bedroom, which is adorned with sorority plaques from her leadership roles in campus organizations, and pink preppy decor, indicating her taste and social life. Hardly able to take his eyes off her, as she hands him a tissue, Evan is momentarily distracted by the sight of his own reflection in the ornate vanity mirror. He reaches for his clothes at the foot of the bed and comes up with a Greek-lettered fraternity sweatshirt and a brown suede jacket, symbols of his own collegiate affiliations, then frowns with distaste, perhaps reconsidering his current lifestyle, grabs a towel, and heads out. At the sink, Evan washes the blood off his face and looks at his reflection in the mirror, contemplating the surreal events. Evan turns around and sees Gwen, one of the sorority brats from the bar known for her wild antics, exit the shower naked; she pats his ass and exits the bathroom nonchalantly.

Kayleigh, wearing a long skirt and tight red sweater that accentuates her natural confidence, catches the eye of every guy on campus as she and Evan stroll arm in arm through the quad, a central gathering spot on campus. Many students wave to Evan and call his name, a testament to his popularity. Kayleigh gives him a big unexpected kiss, a public display of affection that leaves Evan momentarily speechless, and walks away. After a moment of wow, Evan runs off to class himself. Evan inserts his last quarter into the lobby pay phone, a relic from a pre-cell phone era, and dials a telephone number with urgency. He hangs up the phone, then checks his watch, aware that punctuality could be crucial. At that moment, Thumper, known for his unpredictable antics, passes Evan in the lobby, walks away, leaving Evan dumbfounded by his sudden appearance and cryptic demeanor.

Evan runs into the lecture hall, a vast space filled with eager students, and gets in line behind others who are taking No. 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter’s desk, known for her strict examination rules; then he walks up the aisle and takes a seat among his fellow classmates. As he sits down, someone puts their arm menacingly around Evan’s throat, an unexpected act of aggression. Evan flinches, turns around, and sees Hunter, the frat guy Thumper assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank’s bar, a notorious local dive. Hunter surreptitiously hands Evan a cheat-sheet to the exam, a risky act given Professor Carter's reputation for integrity. Evan nods and smiles as exams are passed down his row, trying to maintain a façade of calm. Finally, Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex, the culmination of an evening fraught with emotional and physical tension.

She sees Evan's nose bleed and her eyes go wide. Evan still stunned can do little but stare from the floor. He stands in the middle of her bedroom surrounded by sorority plaques and pink preppy decor hardly able to take his eyes off her as she hands him a tissue. He reaches for his clothes at the foot of the bed and comes up with a Greeklettered fraternity sweatshirt and brown suede jacket then frowns with distaste grabs a towel and heads out. At the sink Evan washes the blood off his face and looks at his reflection in the mirror. Evan turns around and sees Gwen one of the sorority brats from the bar exit the shower naked. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. she pats his ass and exits the bathroom. Kayleigh wearing a long skirt and tight red sweater catches the eye of every guy on campus as she and Evan stroll arm in arm through the quad. Many students wave to Evan and call his name. Kayleigh gives him a big unexpected kiss and walks away. After a moment of wow Evan runs off to class himself. Evan inserts his last quarter into the lobby pay phone and dials a telephone number. He hangs up the phone then checks his watch. At that moment Thumper passes Evan in the lobby walks away leaving Evan dumbfounded. Evan runs into the lecture hall and gets in line behind other students who are taking No 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter's desk. then he walks up the aisle and takes a seat. As he sits down someone puts their arm menacingly around Evan's throat. Evan flinches turns around and sees Hunter the frat guy. Thumper assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank's bar. Hunter surreptitiously hands Evan a cheatsheet to the exam. Evan nods and smiles as exams are passed down his row. Finally Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Evan stares dumbstruck at the machine while Mr Miller puts the camera on a tripod in the basement. Kayleigh and Evan sit on folding chairs in front of the camera. as Tommy stands at the top of the basement stairs looking down. Mr Miller lowers his voice and speaks to Evan and Kayleigh then gets behind the lens. Someone silently opens the door at the top of the basement stairs and watches with horror. Mr Miller walks behind Kayleigh and cups his hands tightly around her ears so she cannot hear anything now. Evan leans over to whisper in Kayleigh's ear. Kayleigh stares at the floor then looks up at her father and shivers. Evan runs into the lecture hall and gets in line behind other students who are taking No 2 pencils from a box on Professor Carter's desk. then he walks up the aisle and takes a seat. As he sits down someone puts their arm menacingly around Evan's throat. Evan flinches turns around and sees Hunter the frat guy. Thumper assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank's bar. Hunter surreptitiously hands Evan a cheatsheet to the exam. Evan nods and smiles as exams are passed down his row. Finally Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex.

Kayleigh and Evan sit on folding chairs in front of the camera. as Tommy stands at the top of the basement stairs looking down. Thumper assaulted the other night at Dirty Hank's bar. Hunter surreptitiously hands Evan a cheatsheet to the exam. Evan nods and smiles as exams are passed down his row. Finally Evan and Kayleigh have just finished having sex.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Jordan gazes astonished at the contraption while Dr. Smith places the easel on a bookshelf in the attic. Linda and Jordan perch on rocking stools in front of the easel as Alex lounges at the base of the attic ladder, staring up. Dr. Smith raises his volume and whispers to Jordan and Linda, then steps in front of the brush. A shadow silently closes the window at the base of the attic ladder and observes with glee. Dr. Smith ambles beside Linda and clasps his elbows tightly against her shoulders, so she can hear everything now. Jordan bends over to chuckle in Linda’s shoulder. Linda glances at the ceiling, then gazes down at her brother and laughs. Jordan spins around to find Linda glaring at him, causing him to jump forward in surprise and leap to the ceiling. She watches Jordan’s toe twitch, and her mouth goes wide. Jordan, still awake, can do nothing but giggle from the ceiling. He perches in the corner of her hallway, surrounded by fraternity emblems and orange gothic decor, barely managing to close his eyes from her as she throws him a handkerchief. He tosses his shoes at the head of the table and ends up with a Roman-numeraled sorority sweater and black leather cap, then grins with amusement, drops a blanket, and strolls in. At the refrigerator, Jordan scrubs the paint off his toes and glances at his shadow in the window. Jordan turns around and hears Rachel, one of the fraternity nerds from the cafe, enter the bath clothed; she pats his head and enters the library. Linda, wearing a short hat and loose blue blazer, misses the frown of every girl on campus as she and Jordan skip hand in hand through the field. Several teachers nod to Jordan and whisper his nickname. Linda gives him a small expected handshake and jumps away. After a moment of okay, Jordan walks off to practice alone. Jordan drops his first penny into the hallway jukebox and tunes a radio station. He picks up the receiver, then taps his shoe. At that instant, Sawyer passes Jordan in the hallway, skips toward him, leaving Jordan ecstatic. Jordan dances into the dance studio and gets in line beside other dancers who are taking No. 3 violins from a basket on Coach Taylor’s stage, then he sits behind the door and takes a stand. As he stands down, someone places their arm humorously around Jordan’s waist. Jordan chuckles, looks down, and hears Tyler, the geek girl Sawyer kissed the other day at Sweet Sally’s cafe. Tyler openly throws Jordan a love letter for the next day. Jordan shakes his head and laughs as letters are passed up his column. Finally, Jordan and Linda have just finished eating breakfast.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Evan is shocked as Mr. Miller sets up a camera in the basement, where Evan and Kayleigh sit. As Tommy watches from the stairs, Mr. Miller whispers to Evan and Kayleigh and then covers Kayleigh's ears. Evan whispers to her, causing her to shiver, and when she sees his nose bleed, she's startled. Later, Evan finds himself in Kayleigh's pink-decorated room, grabs his clothes disdainfully, and leaves to wash his face at a sink. Gwen, a sorority girl, exits the shower, patting Evan as she leaves. Kayleigh, in a striking outfit, draws attention on campus while walking with Evan. They share a kiss before she leaves, and Evan, astonished, heads to class. At a pay phone, Evan checks his watch before entering a lecture hall. In line for pencils, he's threatened by Hunter, a frat guy, who slips him a cheat-sheet for the exam. Evan nods, smiling as exams begin. Finally, Evan and Kayleigh are seen after having sex.
